hbpIcon

directive in hbpCommon

This directive represents the icon corresponding to an entity type. It's possible to provide the type as a string (attribute: type) or an entity object (attribute: entity) having a property named _entityType.

admitted values for type/_entityType:

  • root
  • project
  • folder
  • file
  • release
  • link:folder
  • link:file
  • link:project
  • link:release
angular.module('iconExample', ['hbpCommon'])
    .controller('iconController', function($scope) {
        $scope.entity = { _entityType: 'project' };
        $scope.type = 'folder';
    }
);
<div ng-controller="iconController">
this is the icon for a {{entity._entityType}}: <hbp-icon entity="entity"></hbp-icon><br/>
this is the icon for a: {{type}} <hbp-icon type="type"></hbp-icon>
</div>
